    userLogout();
    TBX.logout(function(d){
      if(d.status === true)
      {
        document.cookie = "toolbox_user_token=;expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;Path=/;Domain=.foxplaybrasil.com.br";
        location.href = "/";
      }
      else
      {
        openPopup('#modalGeneric', errorTitle, errorText);
      }
    });
  });

      if(UserData.token && UserData.token!=null)
      {
        jQuery("#logout").show();
      }
      else
      {
        jQuery("#logout").hide();
      }
      UserData.printMenuProfile();
    });

		UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
		  if(!UserData.profile)
		  {
			$('#mlist10667add').hide().css("visibility","");

			if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(10667, "show"))

		  }
		});

	  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
		
		UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
		  if(!UserData.profile)
		  {
			$('#mlist11901add').hide().css("visibility","");
			$('#mlist11901remove').hide().css("visibility","");
		  }
		  else
		  {
			if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(11901, "show"))
			{      
			  $('#mlist11901add').hide().css("visibility","");
			  $('#mlist11901remove').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
			}
			else
			{
			  $('#mlist11901add').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
			  $('#mlist11901remove').hide().css("visibility","");
			}
		  }
		});
	  });

	  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
		
		UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
		  if(!UserData.profile)
		  {
			$('#mlist11902add').hide().css("visibility","");
			$('#mlist11902remove').hide().css("visibility","");
		  }
		  else
		  {
			if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(11902, "show"))
			{      
			  $('#mlist11902add').hide().css("visibility","");

	  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
		
		UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
		  if(!UserData.profile)
		  {
			$('#mlist11899add').hide().css("visibility","");
			$('#mlist11899remove').hide().css("visibility","");
		  }
		  else
		  {
			if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(11899, "show"))
			{

	  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
		
		UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
		  if(!UserData.profile)
		  {
			$('#mlist9454add').hide().css("visibility","");
			$('#mlist9454remove').hide().css("visibility","");
		  }
		  else
		  {
			if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(9454, "show"))

id="modalText"></p></section></div><script>
  // This is called with the results from from FB.getLoginStatus().
  function statusChangeCallback(response) {
    //console.log('statusChangeCallback');
    console.log(response);
    // The response object is returned with a status field that lets the
    // app know the current login status of the person.
    // Full docs on the response object can be found in the documentation
    // for FB.getLoginStatus().
    if (response.status === 'connected') {
        // Logged into your app and Facebook.

		var accesToken = response.authResponse.accessToken
         //document.getElementById('accessToken').value = response.authResponse.accessToken;
 		jQuery.ajax({
		type: 'GET',
          url: 'http://api.foxplaybrasil.com.br/profiles/'+ProfileId+'/activate/facebook?accessToken='+accesToken+'&alertNotificationEmail=' + jQuery('#checkEmail').is(':checked'),
		success: function(result)
		{
		  //alert(JSON.stringify(arguments));
				//showMsg ('add','myList',title,pictureUrl) 
          //jQuery(".modalBody").hide();
          //jQuery(".modalBody.successfacebook").show();	  
            openPopup('#modalGeneric', 'FOX Play', langModificationSuccess);

		},
		error: function()
		{
			
          //jQuery(".modalBody").hide();
          //jQuery(".modalBody.error").show();	 
           	openPopup('#modalGeneric', langErrorTitle, langErrorText); 

		}
	});

        // This is not required for FOXPlay's user activation
            //testAPI();
    } else if (response.status === 'not_authorized') {
      // The person is logged into Facebook, but not your app.
      document.getElementById('status').innerHTML = 'Please log ' +
        'into this app.';
    } else {
      // The person is not logged into Facebook, so we're not sure if
      // they are logged into this app or not.
      document.getElementById('status').innerHTML = 'Please log ' +
        'into Facebook.';
    }
  }

  // This function is called when someone finishes with the Login
  // Button.  See the onlogin handler attached to it in the sample
  // code below.
  function checkLoginState() {
    FB.getLoginStatus(function(response) {
      statusChangeCallback(response);
    });
  }

  window.fbAsyncInit = function() {
  FB.init({
    appId: '302007359913941',
    cookie     : true,  // enable cookies to allow the server to access
                        // the session
    xfbml      : true,  // parse social plugins on this page
    version    : 'v2.0' // use version 2.0
  });

  // Now that we've initialized the JavaScript SDK, we call
  // FB.getLoginStatus().  This function gets the state of the
  // person visiting this page and can return one of three states to
  // the callback you provide.  They can be:
  //
  // 1. Logged into your app ('connected')
  // 2. Logged into Facebook, but not your app ('not_authorized')
  // 3. Not logged into Facebook and can't tell if they are logged into
  //    your app or not.
  //
  // These three cases are handled in the callback function.

      
  };

  // Load the SDK asynchronously
  (function(d, s, id) {
    var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
    if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
    js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
    js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/pt_BR/sdk.js";
    fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
  }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));


function fb_login(){
    FB.login(function(response) {

        if (response.authResponse) {
          //console.log('Welcome!  Fetching your information.... ');
          //console.log(response); // dump complete info
          //access_token = response.authResponse.accessToken; //get access token
          //user_id = response.authResponse.userID; //get FB UID
		 statusChangeCallback(response);

        } else {
            //user hit cancel button
            console.log('User cancelled login or did not fully authorize.');

        }
    }, {
        scope: 'public_profile,email'
    });
}
  
  
</script><div id="modalRegister" style="display: none;" class="modalBox"><header><span>Bem-vindo ao FOX Play</span><span class="close pullRight vectors" onClick="jQuery.fn.custombox('close');"><svg version="1.1" class="iconsX1" viewBox="0 0 40 40"><g><circle class="svgFill" cx="20" cy="20" r="20"></circle><path class="svgStroke" d="M7.414,7.413c6.94-6.939,18.231-6.939,25.172,0c6.941,6.941,6.94,18.232,0,25.173 c-6.939,6.939-18.231,6.939-25.172,0C0.473,25.645,0.474,14.354,7.414,7.413 M5.858,5.858c-7.811,7.811-7.811,20.472,0,28.283 c7.811,7.811,20.474,7.811,28.284,0s7.811-20.472,0-28.283S13.669-1.953,5.858,5.858L5.858,5.858z"/><polygon points="25.057,13.388 20,18.444 14.945,13.388 13.389,14.944 18.445,20 13.389,25.055 14.944,26.611 20,21.555 25.056,26.611 26.611,25.055 21.555,19.999 26.611,14.944"/></g></svg></span></header><div class="modalBody"><h2>Complete seu perfil e personalize sua experiência</h2><div class="mt20"><div class="mt5 pullLeft"><div class="checkStyle"><input type="checkbox" value="None" id="checkTerms" name="check"/><label for="checkTerms"></label></div></div><div class="mb10"><label class="mr20">Sim, eu li e concordo com os

  // SEARCH INPUT
  jQuery.widget("custom.autocomplete", jQuery.ui.autocomplete, {
    _renderMenu: function (ul, items) {
      var that = this,
          currentCategory = "";
      jQuery.each(items, function (index, item) {
        if (item._type != currentCategory) {
          ul.append("<h3 class='ui-autocomplete-category search_title'>" + (item._type == "serie" ? 'Series TV' : '') + (item._type == "movie" ? 'Filmes' : '') + (item._type == "live" ? 'Eventos en vivo' : '') + "</h3>");
          currentCategory = item._type;
        }
        that._renderItemData(ul, item);
      });
    }
  });
  
  $(function () {
    
    
    $("#input-search").autocomplete({
      appendTo: ".search",
      delay: 0,
      source: function (request, response) {
        jQuery.ajax({
          url: "/br/ajax/search/json.html",
          type: "get",
          dataType: "json",
          data: {"q": request.term.split(".").join("")},
          success: function (data) {
          //console.log(data);
            response(jQuery.map(data.hits.hits, function (item) {
              //console.log(item);
              return item;
            }));
          }
        });
      },
      minLength: 3,
      focus: function (event, ui) {
        event.preventDefault(); // without this: keyboard movements reset the input to ''
        $(this).val($('.ui-state-focus hgroup h2').html());
      },
      
    }).data('customAutocomplete')._renderItem = function (ul, item) {
      
      var urls = [];
      urls["live"] = "/watch/E";
      urls["movie"] = "/watch/M";
      urls["serie"] = "/show/";
      
      return $("<li class='" + item._type + "'>")
        .data("ui-autocomplete-item", item)
        .append("<a href='"+urls[item._type]+item._id+"'>" + "<figure class='search_thumb_container'><img src='" + (typeof (item._source.thumbnail) != "undefined" ? '' + item._source.thumbnail + '' : 'http://placehold.it/52x77') + "'/></figure><hgroup><h2>" + (item._type == "live" ? '' + item._source.eventName + '' : '' + item._source.title.substring( item._source.title.indexOf( " (" ) , item._source.title ) + '') + '</h2>' + (item._type == "movie" ? '<h3>(' + (typeof (item._source.year) != "undefined" ? '' + item._source.year + '' : '') + ')</h3>' : '') + '<h5>' + (typeof (item._source.genres) != "undefined" ? '' + (item._source.genres).toString().replace(/\s*,\s*|\s+,/g, ', ') + '' : '') + '' + (typeof (item._source.genre) != "undefined" ? '' + (item._source.genre).replace('-', ' ') + '' : '') + (typeof (item._source.tuneInDate) != "undefined" ? '' + (item._source.tuneInDate) + '' : '') + (typeof (item._source.tuneInHour) != "undefined" ? ' - ' + (item._source.tuneInHour) + '' : '') + '</h5></hgroup></a>')
        .appendTo(ul);
      
      
    };
    
  }); //End Funcion
  // END - SEARCH INPUT
</script><script>
  jQuery(function() {
    jQuery( ".accordion" ).accordion();
    jQuery( "#accordion" ).accordion();
  });
</script><script>
  jQuery(document).ready(function(){
    
    if(jQuery.cookie('mobilenotice') == 1){
      jQuery('.mobile-link').show();
    };  
    
    
    jQuery('.loupe').click(function(){

      var s = jQuery('.srchBar').val().split(".").join(""); 
      
      if (s.length >= 2){
        var link = "/search/"+s;
      	document.location.href=link;
      } 
      
    });
    jQuery('.srchBar').keypress(function(e){
      if (e.keyCode == 13) {
        var s = jQuery('.srchBar').val().split(".").join(""); 
        if (s.length >= 2){
        	var link = "/search/"+s;
        	document.location.href=link;	
        }
        return false;
      }
      
    });
  
    
  });
  //natgeo;
